name: Arabica 80% Robusta 20%- Roasted Coffee Beans
description:
• This particular blend is perfect for coffee connoisseurs who prefer a strong brew. The higher percentage of Robusta beans ensures a brighter and sharper flavour with a zingy aftertaste.
  • DRINKING PREFERENCES: Great for milk-based drinks like Cappuccino, Espresso latte, and Cold coffee.
  •  Our range of blends is the perfect amalgamation of flavour from roasted top-quality, AA-Grade Arabica and Robusta beans grown in the verdant hills of the Bababudangiri Range in Chikkamagaluru, Karnataka. Enjoy the nuanced flavours of high-altitude, shade-grown coffee. 
  • Our larger quality offerings are perfect to stock up your office pantry or for coffee machines at any food retail outlet.
  • SHELF LIFE: 12 months from the date of manufacture
